title: TikTok Shooting Threat Prompts Schools to Take Precautions
sub_head: Law enforcement in many places have deemed threats not credible; schools weigh how to react
body:
Several schools across the U.S. closed Friday and others issued warnings after they said threats of violence circulated across social-media site TikTok—threats that law enforcement in many places deemed weren’t credible.
Anonymous TikTok posts, school officials say, threatened shootings at U.S. schools on Friday, which prompted districts coast-to-coast to weigh whether to close their doors, beef up security or alert parents of threats.
